attributes.action: Give parents & guardians the option without fines school reopen in June
attributes.additional_details:
Some do not agree with Govt handling of this crisis and feel it is too early to return children to schools. It seems it could pose risks not only to children but also teachers and those that live with - grandparents, parents and those underlying health conditions.

Even drop-off and collection could increase risk of transmission among parents.eception to year 6 wont know the meaning of social distancing, year 10-11 I can understand because of exams and know how to listen and social distance.
attributes.background:
As Boris Johnson has suggested this could happen in England. As a parent I don’t want to face serious repercussions for making a choice I feel affects the safety of my daughter during a global pandemic.

The UK now has the highest death toll in Europe and second highest in the world.
